main event: A report about unidentified flying objects was generated in response to a sighting in Lakeland, Florida, on August 8, 1964.
interesting points: The report includes observations of strange lights in the sky that moved erratically and at times paused mid-air before accelerating,The observer had 30 years of experience in electrical engineering and was conducting experiments at the time of the sighting,The report expresses a desire to know if others in the area observed the same phenomenon,There is a mention of a sketch submitted by the observer,The observer noted a bright object moving slowly towards the east but lost it in low clouds.
witness description: an electrical engineer with 30 years of experience
